item.description:
The first sit-down dinner for NEEM will be at a traditional Italian restaurant-Lucia Ristorante. (http://www.luciabosto...) It's been in the neighborhood for 32 years and has many Italian specialties under the headings of Pasta, Seafood, Chicken, Veal and Steak. Prices range as follows- Antipasti: $4.50-16.95, Pasta: $13.95-18.95, Entrees: $16.50-27.75. You do not have to order any specific number of courses. The restaurant is located on the right-hand side of lower Hanover Street as you're walking toward the waterfront, opposite the fire station. As you enter, take the stairway on the right down one flight. The nearest T-station to the North End is Haymarket. (Orange & Green Lines) For those who can make it, we'll have a cocktail hour to mingle from 6:00-7:00. Then we'll sit down for dinner at 7:00. I'll announce the after-party at dinner. Please make your final RSVP by Tuesday, May 26th at 5:00 PM.

Important: Please access our "About" tab for further guidelines. Thank you.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the near end of the bar.
item.name: Lucia Ristorante-Dinner
